fields.title: sound
fields.description: Required. A `string` that defines the sound. Should be defined in `sound.definitions.josn`.

fields.title: player
fields.description: Optional. A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: position
fields.description: Optional. `Vector` [x y z] of the position sounds originate from.

fields.title: volume
fields.description: Optional. A `float` that specifies the volume. Between 0.0 and 1.0. Below 1.0 diminishes the sound. 0 is inaudible. Default: `1.0`.

fields.title: pitch
fields.description: Optional. A `float` that specifies the pitch. Must bet between 0.0 and 256. Default: `1.0`.

fields.title: minimumVolume
fields.description: A `float` that specifies the volume. Between 0.0 and 1.0. Default: `0.0`.

overloads.title: Play sound
overloads.description: Play a `sound` with optional `player`, `position`, `volume`, `pitch`, and `minimum volume`.
